member.name: NET_IF_ADMIN_STATUS
member.summary: The NET_IF_ADMIN_STATUS enumeration type specifies theNDIS network interface administrative status, as described in RFC 2863.

member.name: NET_IF_ADMIN_STATUS.NET_IF_ADMIN_STATUS_UP
member.summary: Specifies that the interface is initialized and enabled, but the interface is not necessarily ready to transmit and receive network data because that depends on the operational status of the interface. For more information about the operational status of an interface, seeOID_GEN_OPERATIONAL_STATUS.

member.name: NET_IF_ADMIN_STATUS.NET_IF_ADMIN_STATUS_DOWN
member.summary: Specifies that the interface is down, and this interface cannot be used to transmit or receive network data.

member.name: NET_IF_ADMIN_STATUS.NET_IF_ADMIN_STATUS_TESTING
member.summary: Specifies that the interface is in a test mode, and no network data can be transmitted or received.
